_comment: This is an example preferences.json file. Copy this file to 'preferences.json' and customize the values below for your setup.

paths._description: File system paths used by the application
paths._input_loc_help: Directory where lab data files are stored (used by labdata tool)
paths._output_loc_help: Directory where generated PNG performance summary files will be saved
paths._remote_help: rclone remote path for backing up files to Google Drive (format: remote_name:folder_path)

subjects: _description: List of lab subject IDs to process. Example: ['GRB036', 'GRB037', 'GRB038']
_subjects_help: Replace the example subjects above with your actual lab subject IDs

notion._description: Notion API version settings - usually don't need to change these
notion._version_help: Current Notion API version for new features
notion._version_legacy_help: Legacy Notion API version for database operations
